body: I let my account to a friend and my friend used hacks ;(
body_tagged: I let my account to a friend and my friend used hacks ;(
title: UnBan me please

replies.body:
E-mail support@avicus.net saying what happened and why you should be appealed whait 2 weeks, if not appealed re-send or PM a manager on skype
http://avicus.net/support#contact
http://avicus.net/rules

replies.body: I think that there should be on the home page something that says in big bold red letters "PLEASE DO NOT APPEAL ON THE FORUMS; APPEAL AT support@avicus.net"

replies.body:
Yeah, I saw you fly hacking on a Quintus game...
If you are telling the truth, please follow the instructions above        ^
